pages.text: "A machine used to combine items together. For example, dusts and cobblestone to form their ore counterparts."$(p)I mean...there's not much else to say is there? You can combine dusts and cobblestone to get their ore counterparts, or two dyes to get a different color dye (2x than how much you would normally get by

using a crafting grid, e.g. 1 red dye and 1 white dye would give 4 pink dyes).$(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)
